query: SELECT S.nickname,ABS(E.eform+SDE.value) AS err ,C.xc AS xc FROM expt E JOIN species S ON E.expt__species=S.species_id JOIN species_dataset_element SDE ON SDE.species_dataset_element__species=S.species_id JOIN calc C ON C.calc_id = E.expt__calc WHERE SDE.property='cohesive energy' AND SDE.value IS NOT NULL and E.eform IS NOT NULL
glfunc: lambda x: x[:x.find('_')] if x else None
title: Cohesive energy errors
